Text: thanks, I hope you will start uploading the Cup races, and in less than 1.5 gig. out here, it takes almost a week to download that size, and quite often the seeds all stop before 50%. out here in the boonies of the world, we don't care about 720, x264, mkv, etc. we need ordinary xvid and avi files that are not too huge. thank you for reading my rant. rontorr in Thailand
RACE please, oh, and I don't care about the size, just put it up!!!
